overview: Since he was little, Agus wanted to become a penghulu, but the marriage rate in Agus sub-district has dropped dramatically. The sub-district branch is threatened with having to join the adjoining sub-district which is chaired by Deon, a narcissistic and materialistic young headman with his assistant, Mamud, the scalper who is also Deon's manager.  At the same time, Agus received bad news. His parents are getting a divorce. Agus' view of the beauty of marriage is shattered in an instant. It seemed that right now, the most important person he had to convince was himself.
title: Kawin Laris
